titles.title: To establish "Golden Sea Bream" as an acceptable market name for Stenotomus chrysops.
To establish "Golden Sea Bream" as an acceptable market name for Stenotomus chrysops.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This bill permits the Stenotomus chrysops species of fish (also known as scup) to be labeled or marketed using the name golden sea bream.
